Talk_250:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now that the blizzard has finally stopped,
my sisters and I can get back to work.

Douma headed off to the northeast
toward <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>, I think.

She's looking into a rumor about some
kind of underground city there...

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>She's a little too quick to trust people, in
my opinion. I hope she's not chasing a
lead that goes nowhere...
Talk_251:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, hello, Link. Working hard at such
a late hour—good, good...
Talk_Tribune02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Trouble>Let's see... Right now, he should be
canvassing at <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks Stable<clr:ffff> over
in <clr:0000>west Necluda<clr:ffff> in southeastern Hyrule.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>The Yiga Clan recently sent the paper
a <clr:0000>statement concerning Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>,
you see.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It definitely shook me at first, but then I
reminded myself that it could just be a
bunch of hot air.
Regardless, I asked Penn to figure out if it
was true or not.
Talk_235:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I gotta say, you did a good job finding us
out here. Some go right on by.

It's pretty unusual for a newspaper to be
run out of a stable. Traysi cheated the
previous owner out of this place.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But you see things like they are, don't
you? Hmm...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey, want to be a reporter? Shine
light on the truth? Expose the evils
in our world?
I could put in a word with Traysi for you...
Talk_252:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>He puts on a pretty confident act, but
Penn is still a rookie reporter.

There's a number of things he hasn't got
a handle on yet, so take care of him.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Remember—where there's a crowd, there
are rumors! And where there are rumors,
there might be leads to Princess Zelda!
<clr:0000>Canvass<clr:ffff> the stables and see what you can
find out!
Talk_Tribune03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble>Let's see... Right around now, he should
be canvassing at <clr:0000>Tabantha Bridge Stable<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>That'd be around the bridge that connects
<clr:0000>Tabantha Frontier <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>Hyrule Ridge<clr:ffff>,
directly south of here.
I heard some of the livestock at the
stable suddenly disappeared...

<sp:3:0:2:0701>He took off that way...said something
about his reporter's instincts shouting
at him.
Talk_236:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>Oh, wait a minute...<sp:5:0:0> It's you!<sp:5:1:0> I gotta say,
you did a good job getting out here to
find us.
It's quite a hike from Lookout Landing
when you haven't got wings, but here you
are! Was it easy to find the place?
Some folks pass by without a second look.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>After all, it was a stable, until Traysi
cheated the previous owner out of it.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But you don't miss a thing, do you?
Not bad, not bad at all...<sp:0:4:0>I assume you came for the job. You
want to work for the newspaper, right?
I'll vouch for you with Traysi.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Just picture it! Traveling the world as a
reporter, shining light on the truth! We'll
be partners out there.
Talk_253:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>By the way, how are you and Penn
doing? Everything going OK?
Talk_Tribune04:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble>Let's see... Right around now, he should
be canvassing at <clr:0000>Riverside Stable<clr:ffff> along
the river in <clr:0000>southeast Hyrule Field<clr:ffff>.
That stable is all about fine dining. It's
ALWAYS packed with gourmets looking
for the next big dish.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ya know, Penn is a bit of a gourmet
himself, so maybe he flew straight there.
Talk_270:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm sorry... I know worryin' after Penn
is a small thing compared to all the other
stuff going on.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>We at the newspaper might only be able
to send out the news we hear...

But we'll do all we can to help you find
Princess Zelda!

And don't forget, Link—if you're ever
feeling lost, reading the newspaper might
just help you!
Talk_271:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'll have you know that full set of froggy
armor is one of my newspaper's most-
valuable assets.
With that, you'll cling to wet surfaces
with no fear of slipping. But you're going
to have to earn it.
You work with Penn to <clr:0000>get to the bottom
of the rumors <clr:ffff>about Princess Zelda...

and I'll give you that froggy armor,
piece by piece. First you've got to make
your editor here happy.
Talk_254: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, Link. Nice to see you hard at work.
Talk_Tribune05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble>Let's see... Right around now, he should
be canvassing at <clr:0000>Wetland Stable<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Do you know it? It's the place right
across <clr:0000>Rebonae Bridge<clr:ffff>, over in eastern
<clr:0000>Hyrule Field<clr:ffff>.
Actually, it's pretty close to <clr:0000>Kakariko
Village<clr:ffff>. That's where those ruins—the
Ring Ruins I think— fell down.
With all that going on, there have been
a lot more travelers in the area. And that
means more information and rumors!
Penn had a hunch he'd be able to find
some good info there, so he headed out
that way.
Talk_238:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:QuestionAngry_00>Don't you listen, Penn? I told you I was
busy, but you keep bothering me!

And another thing—I bought this place
from the owner after we came to a fair,
mutually beneficial agreement.
Could you stop telling people I cheated
him out of it?
Talk_255:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, hello, Link. Hard at work so early
in the morning, I see.
Talk_Tribune06:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble>Let's see... Right around now, he should
be canvassing <clr:0000>New Serenne Stable<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's a place out to the east, past the
<clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff>.

It used to be somewhere else, but after
the new road was built, the place moved
to the new location.
Seems like it was the right move—
business is booming there!

I'm not sure if that's why he headed
out there though.

All he said was "The little birds are
calling!" Then he took off with a big
grin on his face.
Talk_239:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseS>I... <sp:5:1:0>S-sorry, Traysi. But there's a new
applicant for a reporter job. <sp:5:1:0>I wanted
you to know...
Talk_273:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>I've heard from Penn. So, you must be
here to pick up some of the <clr:0000>froggy
armor<clr:ffff>, right?
Talk_Tribune_End10:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'd hand over some of the <clr:0000>froggy armor<clr:ffff>,
but you'll need to free up space in your
pack first.
Talk_256:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>He puts on a pretty confident act, but
Penn is still a rookie reporter.

There's a number of things he hasn't got
a handle on yet, so take care of him.

That <clr:0000>Demon King<clr:ffff>, or whatever he's called,
showed up... Nothing is going how we'd
like it.
But until Princess Zelda has been found,
we've got to keep focusing on finding
clues about her!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Remember—where there's a crowd, there
are rumors! <clr:0000>Canvass <clr:ffff>the stables and see
what you can find out!
Talk_Tribune07:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble>Let's see... Right around now, he should
be canvassing <clr:0000>Outskirt Stable<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>That's a stable far, far, faaar to the south
of here. It's right on the border between
<clr:0000>Hyrule Field <clr:ffff>and the <clr:0000>Gerudo<clr:ffff> region.
A <clr:0000>huge Zonai ruin <clr:ffff>fell near there, so
there've been a lot of researchers on
top of the usual travelers visiting.
"Where there are people, there's info!"<sp:5:1:0>
That's what Penn said, anyway. Not quite
how I'd put it, but true all the same.
Talk_274:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'll be waiting here for more news stories
about <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>.
Talk_257:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease>I'd thought Penn would be here to say
somethin' as well, but...

<sp:3:0:2:0301>When I mentioned it to him, he said,
"I've got to get to training and improve
myself! It's the only way to stay ahead!"
Talk_275:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm counting on you to visit all of the
stables in Hyrule.

Think of those stables as soup pots full
of all kinds of tasty leads. Get out there
and spoon up that news.
Talk_Tribune09:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble>Let's see... Right around now, he should
be canvassing <clr:0000>Snowfield Stable<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Take the road out front and <clr:0000>head north<clr:ffff>.
You'll get there soon enough. Oh, but it's
in the <clr:0000>Hebra region<clr:ffff>, so pack warm!
Talk out of that part of the world is
all about a rare horse that may have
been spotted.
Penn was going on about how his "wild
sense" was calling to him.

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Wild sense, ha...<sp:5:1:0> He should start with basic sense
before working his way up to anything clever...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_Tribune_End12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Enough of that. You probably just want
what I promised. Well, fair enough.
Here's <clr:0000>what you earned<clr:ffff>.
Talk_259:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I was glad to hand over that whole set of
froggy armor, Link. You earned it.

<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Besides, it was an impulse buy. Didn't fit me or my
sisters. Or Penn.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_277:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>All right. How about you give me the
whole story, Link.

I'm the editor of the Lucky Clover Gazette
here, if you couldn't tell.<sp:5:0:0> I recognized you
right away, despite what you're wearing.
Don't worry. <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff> asked us for help
digging into <clr:0000>what's happened to
Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>.
Now, tell me everything.<sp:5:1:0> What exactly
brought you here?
Talk_278:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>A pretty good deal there, Link...<sp:5:1:0>


Anyway,<sp:5:0:0> that's my offer.
Talk_279: <sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Shitauchi_01>Ah, um... I need that space to work.
Near_Tribune_End: Maybe we can relax a little.
Talk_240:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Hey, <sp:5:0:0>sorry, Penn. But could you...<sp:5:1:0>give
me and this guy a second here?<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_241:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>All right. How about you give me the
whole story, Link.

I'm the editor of the Lucky Clover Gazette
here, if you couldn't tell. So, don't worry.

I know everyone involved with this story.
<clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff> asked us for help digging into
<clr:0000>what's happened to Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>.
Now, tell me everything.<sp:5:1:0> What exactly
brought you here?
Talk_242:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Interesting...<sp:1:0:4:1e000000> So that's why she's asked
you to investigate places seriously
impacted by the Upheaval.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, coming here was a great call!


What I mean is, we're getting tips from all
over Hyrule. So many, in fact, that it's
been hard to keep up!
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>And among those tips, we've been
hearing about <clr:0000>someone who looks like the
princess<clr:ffff> appearing in all sorts of places.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I was about to assign <clr:0000>Penn <clr:ffff>to chase
those leads, but he could use a partner.

I won't tell Penn who you are. It's better
if no one knows you're involved.

What do you say? Think you could work
with him as we investigate?
Talk_Tribune10:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble>Let's see... Right around now, he should
be canvassing near <clr:0000>South Akkala Stable<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>The stable there is right on the border
of the <clr:0000>Eldin <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>Akkala <clr:ffff>regions, off to
the northeast.
Penn headed that way, sayin' his little
birds gave him a hot scoop on somethin'
really strange...
Apparently, there's a talkin' Cucco
out there.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>I told him there was absolutely no way
that was possible...

And he told me there was absolutely
no way his little birds would lie, then
he flew off.
Talk_226:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice>Shhh!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Traysi, our editor here, is getting ready for
our big <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff> investigation.

You're here about our newspaper, right? Then
you can talk to me too. I'm next in charge.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_Tribune11:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble>Let's see... Right now, I expect he's at
<clr:0000>Foothill Stable<clr:ffff> to the northeast, near the
border between Eldin and Akkala.
In times past, the stable was a busy
place since it was right on the way to
Goron City.
But with the new road having been
built, the stable started seeing fewer
customers...
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Seems that's changed lately though.
We heard about some barely clothed
folks crowding around the place!
I won't lie, I was planning to investigate
this one myself...

<sp:3:0:2:0901>But Penn beat me to it and took off quick
as can be. As he flew away, he said,
"Distracted eyes miss the info prize!"
Whatever that means...
Talk_260:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Yeah, he said he was gonna head to a
place called...<sp:5:1:0> Whatcha's? Watchers?
Wassa's? Hm.
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Well! In any case, I know it's some kind of
<clr:0000>bluff<clr:ffff>! That much is certain.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>It's at the edge of <clr:0000>Hyrule Ridge <clr:ffff>off to
the south, though I don't remember
exactly where.
He also said somethin' about a famous
bard? And that the only way to improve
himself was to go there.
Talk_261:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Huh? You were able to find Washer's...
Wassur's...Wasper's... <sp:5:1:0>That bluff that
Penn mentioned?
He was pretty smug about how the place
could only be reached by those with
wings too...
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, he owes you for all the research you
did as his partner. It let him write about
Princess Zelda, after all.
He'd told me he needed to become
someone his own partner can rely on...

<sp:3:0:2:0801>I think I'm lookin' forward to the next
time I see Penn!
Talk_245:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Well, if our editor here says you're in,
then looks like I had you sized up right.
Traysi knows how to pick 'em.
Talk_Tribune13:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble>Let's see... Right around now, he should
be canvassing <clr:0000>Highland Stable<clr:ffff>.

That stable is right at the most southern
edge of Hyrule.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Penn's little birds told him that
<clr:0000>Princess Zelda's voice<clr:ffff> had been
heard around there.
He took off without a peep or a cheep!
Talk_262:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So, what do you say? Ready to start as
an official reporter for the newspaper?

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>I'm joking!<sp:5:0:0> It's just a joke!


I know you already have your hands full
<clr:0000>searching for Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>, after all.<sp:5:1:0>

But...really...once all this is over, I may
just have a real reporter job available for
you. Hopefully you'd like that!
Talk_246:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>All right, you two. Here's what you're
going to do—<clr:0000>visit every stable<clr:ffff> for leads.
Penn, you'll head this all up.
Stables bring in people, and people bring
details. And details are what we need.
Now...<sp:5:1:0>get me some news!
Talk_Tribune14:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble>Let's see... Right around now, he should
be canvassing <clr:0000>Gerudo Canyon Stable<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>That's the last stable you'd find on the
road before headin' into the <clr:0000>Gerudo
Desert<clr:ffff> in the southwest part of Hyrule.
The weather down there swings between
hot and cold, and horses can't go into
the desert...
There've been rumors the stable is going
to shut down.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Penn said he needed to hurry and gather
as much info as he could before anythin'
like that happened...
Then he was gone faster than you can
say "goodbye." I know that for sure
'cause all I heard from him was "goodb—"
Talk_263:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease>I probably should have told him to take
it easy and say somethin' to you, but...

When I mentioned it to him, he said,
"I've got to get to training and improve
myself! It's the only way to stay ahead!"
Talk_281:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Trouble>You have got to be cold. You're making
me cold just looking at you.

Well, I'm not going to tell you how to
dress for adventure, Link.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>I just appreciate you coming here.
Talk_247:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Readers all over Hyrule have their eyes
and ears peeled for any information
about Princess Zelda's whereabouts!
The Lucky Clover Gazette is equally eager
and is happy to help however it can!
Talk_Tribune_End01:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800>Aha! Our trusty reporter!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>So, Link...Penn's filled me in on all
the latest.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>We're relieved that you managed to get
to the bottom of every one of those
rumors about Princess Zelda.
And our paper's circulation is stronger
than ever. I'm almost speechless!
Talk_282:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Interesting...<sp:5:1:0> You heard <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>'s
voice while you were up in the sky, and
now you're <clr:0000>searching for her<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Have you reported that to <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff>? Head
to <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff> if you haven't. It's
near the Hyrule Castle Town Ruins.
I'm sure that she'd be relieved to see
your face, Link.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, you're here at least. Good instincts,
coming to the newspaper. We get leads
about all sorts of things in Hyrule.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>We've heard about someone who looks
like the princess appearing here and
there too.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I was about to assign <clr:0000>Penn<clr:ffff> to chase
those leads, but he could use a partner.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>I won't tell Penn who you are. It's better
if no one knows you're involved.

What do you say? Think you could work
with him as we investigate?
Talk_248:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>How's it going? Are you and Penn
getting along OK?
Talk_265: <sp:3:0:2:0401>Did you lose track of your partner?
Talk_Tribune16:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble>Let's see... Right around now, he should
be canvassing <clr:0000>Woodland Stable<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>That's a stable in the <clr:0000>Eldin<clr:ffff> region off to
the northeast. It's a good stop if you're
on your way to Goron City.
When a <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff> showed up there,
that was all anyone talked about!

At least for a while. There hasn't been
any news lately...

So of course Penn has headed that
way. He said he could smell the scoop
from here.
Talk_Tribune_End02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>In the end, we didn't actually uncover
where Princess Zelda is.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>But now I know just who to call when
we get another good lead.

Until then, Link, you keep doing what
you do—your part in all this will be clear
soon enough, I bet.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>As for Penn, well, I've given him some
time off with pay. Well-deserved too!
He did a lot of reporting.
I did tell him, "Hey, you say something
nice to your partner after all this?"

I think I put him on the spot, Link. He
looked at me in an odd way and flew off
with barely a "Soar long."
He was right in the middle of writing a
news article too.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Ease>I can't say I know what that was about.
He's bottling something up. Maybe.
Talk_266:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Of course, I wouldn't ask you to do this
for free—though that'd be nice.

Wait just a second. I'm going to get you
a little incentive from the back.
Talk_Tribune_End03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Oh yeah, that'll look good on you.<sp:5:1:0>


Oh, take this too.
Talk_249:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm sorry... I know worryin' after Penn
is a small thing compared to all the other
stuff going on.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>And of course we've heard news about
the return of the Demon King.

We even rushed an extra edition out just
to share that news!

<sp:3:0:2:0700>We at the newspaper might only be able
to send out the news we hear...

but we'll do all we can to help you find
Princess Zelda!

And don't forget, Link—if you're ever
feeling lost, reading the newspaper might
just help you!
Talk_267:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>Ta-daaaa!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>The full set of<clr:0000> froggy armor<clr:ffff>!


With that on, it's easy to cling to wet
surfaces—no slipping!

You work with Penn to chase down all
these news stories, then I'll give you this
armor. Piece by piece, all yours.
Talk_268:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So, that set of <clr:0000>froggy armor<clr:ffff> caught
your eye?

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>With that, you'll <clr:0000>cling to wet surfaces
without slipping<clr:ffff>, great if you need to stay
on the lookout from unexpected places.
Work with Penn to <clr:0000>get to the bottom of
the rumors <clr:ffff>about Princess Zelda. I'll give
you froggy armor, piece by piece.
Talk_Tribune_End05:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>What do you think? Pretty good, huh?
That will really help you stick to wet
surfaces without slipping.
Talk_Tribune_End06:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>That's what I thought you wanted, but
seems like your pack is full.
Talk_269:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Understand>Oh, good job getting to Wussa's...
Wasse's...Wahahasa's... <sp:5:1:0>That bluff that
Penn mentioned.
He was pretty smug about how the place
could only be reached by those with
wings too...
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, he owes you for all the research you
did as his partner. It let him write about
Princess Zelda, after all.
He'd told me he needed to become
someone his own partner can rely on...

<sp:3:0:2:0801>I think I'm lookin' forward to the next
time I see Penn!
Talk_Tribune_End07: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Oh? You clear space in your pack?
Talk_Tribune_End08:
